page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: Carpet Bowling is one of the main pastimes in Johnstonebridge in Winter.The Club meets in the Village Hall, which is also the venue for a very active W.R.I. Fishing on the River Annan is a great attraction with some people even coming from abroad to try for salmon and sea trout.A sewing class is held in the school on Winter evenings and the crook making class in Lockerbie Academy is well attended by many of the men. Many local people curl at Lockerbie Ice Rink, entering competitions both locally and further afield. One of the main events is the local show,held in August, where the results of keen gardening and handicrafts prowess are judged. Even the local children take part in this.
